snippet: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said Israel need not worry about the 25-year period after the nuclear deal, because it would not be around, and ruled out further ties with the United States.
abstract: Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, in remarks published on his website and on Twitter, warns that Israel will not exist in 25 years and dismisses idea that there will be any new negotiations with United States.

byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said Israel need not worry about the 25-year period after the nuclear deal, because it would not be around, and ruled out further ties with the United States.

headline.main: Iran’s Supreme Leader Says Israel Won’t Exist in 25 Years
headline.print_headline: Grim Forecast on Israel From Tehran
